dialog_1.name: Mum
dialog_1.text: Uncle Lee passed you for self defence already?

dialog_2.name: Mum
dialog_2.text: Look at my kid, that is real talent.

dialog_3.name: Mum
dialog_3.text: Here is something small to reward you

dialog_4.name: Mum
dialog_4.text: By the way, I think your brother has a favor to ask of you.
